What is Bootstrap ?

Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains HTML, CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

Bootstrap is Responsive

It can be used by anyone who has basic knowledge in JavaScript, CSS, and HTML as it is easy to learn. What makes it unique is its ability to create fully responsive, mobile-first, and well-functioning websites and apps without fuss
